span: Donate to a nonprofit organisation of your choice:
text: Browse through our list of verified nonprofit organisations and find one that you are passionate about. Make a one-time donation or set up a recurring donation.

span: Share The Giving Trybe with your friends and family:
text: Encourage your friends and family to donate to Nigerian nonprofit organisations through TGT. Share our platform on social media or send them an email.
Do you know of a Nigerian nonprofit organisation that is doing great work? Suggest them to be profiled on TGT. We are always looking for new and innovative organisations to support.
